# bis557

<!-- badges: start -->
 [![Travis build status](https://travis-ci.com/xy272/bis557.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.com/xy272/bis557)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of bis557 is to illustrate how to create an R package for the Ylae Biostatistics bis557 class.

## Installation

You can development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("xy272/bis557")
```
